MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9am to repair an underground cable located on Yetholm Park and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.41am on Tuesday 12th January 2021.
